sentences.en: GR 99027 meteorite from Blue Ice Area in Antarctica is an achondrite.
sentences.cn: 来自南极格罗夫山蓝冰地区的GR99027陨石为一无球粒陨石.

sentences.en: GR99027 meteorite from Blue Ice Area in Antarctica is an achondrite.
sentences.cn: 来自南极格罗夫山蓝冰地区的GR99027陨石为一无球粒陨石。

trans.tran_cn: 不含球粒陨石，无球粒陨石
trans.tran_en: a rare stony meteorite that consists mainly of silicate minerals and has the texture of igneous rock but contains no chondrules
